name: is_finished=false
description:
Plot: You have received an email from an AI who wants to learn how to program games. Complete his simple puzzles to help him collect more data for research.

The puzzles lie in editing entity scripts on the level to alter their behaviour. Note that game is "turn based", so scripts are do not run immediatly.

Unfortunately, as the name implies, this is very stripped-down version of the project. Perhaps I will complete it in the future, but there is no time left.

Controls:

  • WASD to move (if all scripts are correct!)
  • Left mouse click on notes to read them
  • Left mouse click on entities (player/door) to view & edit their scripts

The "ikkle-4" font by Brixdee
